src:
Zmaga Pobegov
07 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Simon Maljevac

Te dni so tudi v območnih balinarskih ligah v Novi Gorici in v Istri sklenili z jesenskim delom prvenstva. Najbolj vesele bodo zimski odmor pričakale balinarke iz Pobegov.



Foto: Simon Maljevac

V moški konkurenci v ligi OBZ slovenska Istra je na vrhu lestvice prezimila zasedba škofijske Oljke. Fantje bodo prvenstvo nadaljevali spomladi, istrska dekleta pa so ga te dni končala. Odločitev o prvem mestu je padla šele v zadnjem krogu, ki je postregel s tremi zelo izenačenimi obračuni. Najbolj veselo je bilo v taboru Pobegov, saj so s točko na gostovanju v Čežarjih osvojile prvenstvo. Drugo mesto je klub porazu proti Modremu valu zasedlo Jagodje, na tretjem mestu pa je sezono sklenila Antena.
Na Goriškem se v moški območni ligi spomladi obeta napet boj za prvo mesto, saj sta vodilna Hubelj in Šempeter jesenski del končala z enakim številom točk.
Rezultati
OBZ Slovenska Istra, ženske, 10. krog - Jadran Izola : Antena 6:4, Modri val : Jagodje 6:4, Čežarji : Pobegi 5:5. Vrstni red - Pobegi 13, Jagodje 11, Antena, Modri val 10, Jadran Izola in Čežarji 8.
OBZ Nova Gorica, 7. krog - Slatna : Gorica 12:6, Orehovlje : Podskala 2:16, Kras : Renče 6:12, Hubelj : Šempeter 12:6. Vrstni red - Hubelj in Šempeter 12, Podskala 10, Renče 8, Slatna in Orehovlje 4, Gorica in Kras 2.
text:
Victory Escapes
07 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Simon Maljevac

These days, they also concluded the fall part of the championship in the regional ballin leagues in Nova Gorica and Istria. The most eagerly awaited winter break will be the ballrooms from Pobegov.



Photo: Simon Maljevac

In the men's competition in the OBZ league, Slovenian Istria was at the top of the list with the Diocese of Olivet. The boys will continue the championship in the spring, and the Istrian girls finished it these days. The decision to go first fell only in the final round, which came with three very even goals. The most fun was in the Pobegov camp, as they won the championship with a point on their visit to the Cesars. Jagodje took second place in the defeat against the Blue Wave, and Antenna finished third in the season.
In Gorizia, in the men's regional league, a tense fight for the first place is expected in the spring, with the leading Hubelj and Šempeter finishing in the autumn with the same number of points.
Results
OBZ Slovenian Istria, Women, Round 10 - Adriatic Izola: Antenna 6: 4, Blue Wave: Strawberry 6: 4, Czagar: Escape 5: 5. Order - Escape 13, Strawberry 11, Antenna, Blue Wave 10, Adriatic Izola and Cezarji 8.
OBZ Nova Gorica, Round 7 - Sweet: Gorizia 12: 6, Orehovlje: Podskala 2:16, Karst: Renče 6:12, Hubelj: Šempeter 12: 6. Order - Hubelj and Šempeter 12, Subscale 10, Renče 8, Slatna and Orehovlje 4, Gorica and Karst 2.
